pullrequest.title: Moved Andrew Hundt's example code to a branch

content.raw:
The example_plugins tests are [failing on mac home-brew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64/85/testReport/):
~~~
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/0, where GetParam() = "animate_joints"
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/1, where GetParam() = "animate_pose"
~~~
Detailed build errors:
~~~
195: [ RUN      ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/0
195: -- The C compiler identification is Clang 5.0.0
195: -- The CXX compiler identification is Clang 5.0.0

195: -- checking for module 'gazebo'
195: --   found gazebo, version 3.0.0
195: -- Boost version: 1.55.0
195: -- Boost version: 1.55.0

195: --   system
195: --   filesystem
195: --   regex
195: -- Configuring done

195: -- Build files have been written to: /tmp/animate_joints-6449-fb8b-3e66-b055
195: Scanning dependencies of target animate_joints
195: [100%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/animate_joints.dir/animate_joints.cc.o
195: In file included from /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/examples/plugins/animate_joints/animate_joints.cc:18:
195: In file included from /Users/jenkins/jenkins.xzpq/Cellar/gazebo/HEAD/include/gazebo-3.0/gazebo/gazebo.hh:20:
195: In file included from /Users/jenkins/jenkins.xzpq/Cellar/gazebo/HEAD/include/gazebo-3.0/gazebo/gazebo_core.hh:19:
195: In file included from /Users/jenkins/jenkins.xzpq/Cellar/gazebo/HEAD/include/gazebo-3.0/gazebo/common/common.hh:6:
195: /Users/jenkins/jenkins.xzpq/Cellar/gazebo/HEAD/include/gazebo-3.0/gazebo/common/Assert.hh:20:10: fatal error: 'boost/assert.hpp' file not found
195: #include <boost/assert.hpp>
195:          ^

195: make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/animate_joints.dir/all] Error 2
195: make[1]: *** [all] Error 2
195: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/test/examples/example_plugins.cc:69: Failure
195: Value of: 0
195: Expected: system(cmd)
195: Which is: 512
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/0, where GetParam() = "animate_joints" (2490 ms)
~~~
~~~
195: [ RUN      ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/1
195: -- The C compiler identification is Clang 5.0.0
